solution_line_template: Amount spent on textbooks is {initial_money}/{textbook_divisor} = <<{initial_money}/{textbook_divisor}={spent_on_textbooks}>>{spent_on_textbooks} dollars.
Amount spent on school supplies is {spent_on_textbooks}/{supplies_divisor} = <<{spent_on_textbooks}/{supplies_divisor}={spent_on_supplies}>>{spent_on_supplies} dollars.
